Trade/Device Name(s): Healgen COC One Step Cocaine Test (Strip, Cassette, Cup, Dip Card)
Healgen MOP One Step Morphine Test (Strip, Cassette, Cup, Dip Card)
Regulation Name(s): Cocaine and cocaine metabolite test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Healgen COC One Step Cocaine Test and Healgen MOP One Step Morphine Test for qualitative detection of benzoylecgonine and morphine in human urine using lateral flow immunochromatographic assay formats
Indications for Use Summary: Immunochromatographic assays for qualitative detection of benzoylecgonine or morphine in human urine at 300 ng/mL cut-off; for over-the-counter and prescription use as preliminary drug of abuse screening
